name: Audio Resource Controller

inputs.name: Audio Resource
inputs.description: The audio source you want to play

outputs.name: Audio
outputs.description: The audio source. Connect it to a speaker to play.

outputs.name: On Play
outputs.description: Execute next node when the audio source starts playing

outputs.name: On Stop
outputs.description: Execute next node when the audio source stops playing

outputs.name: On Finish
outputs.description: Execute next node when the audio source finishes playing

description: Connect to a speaker as an output to play and control the audio resource.
